This structure resembles the [[Village/Structure (old)/Blueprints/Farm Shack|old "Farm Shack"]] seen in [[Village/Structure (old)/Blueprints |pre-1.14 villages]], with multiple changes, such as the gable roof, 2 flowers and a bed. Additionally, the floor is made of cobblestone instead of dirt, and the location of the door has been moved.
